Html:
Hi, we are using the presenter to bind data into views using view injection approach.

Is there an example about how to Load data asynchronously into views from presenter?

Thanks

Hi,

There are different ways to achieve asynchronous data loading, depending mostly on which kind of data we’re speaking about. You can read about the Rx Framework. You can also find Asynchronous Bindings useful, both in WPF and Silverlight. Finally, if the data you want to load is a list, you can check the yield keyword.

There are currently no examples about that in Prism. It is, however, a potential feature for Prism v4, so you can fill this survey and specify it as a desirable feature to be included.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
